problem.markdown:
>>There are only 2 types of interactions between systems that are studied in thermodynamics.<< (x) True ( ) False
[explanation] Only heat and work interactions are considered for study in thermodynamics. [explanation]
problem.p: There are only 2 types of interactions between systems that are studied in thermodynamics.

choicegroup.label: There are only 2 types of interactions between systems that are studied in thermodynamics.

div.p: Only heat and work interactions are considered for study in thermodynamics.
